data.title: Names for a female guinea pig?
data.meta_description:
As some of you may know, I'm looking for a female/sow guinea pig!
JESSLOU saw my thread with the situation (getting my male neutured soon) and has contacted...
data.text:
As some of you may know, I'm looking for a female/sow guinea pig!

JESSLOU saw my thread with the situation (getting my male neutured soon) and has contacted me basically saying she has a little girlie i can have! I'm not sure if she has a name yet (i don't think she has, she hasn't mentioned it) but i can't seem to think of any names just incase! I'm trying not to get excited, and if for some reason this doesn't come through, other people can look at this and name a new piggie/un-named one.

Has anyone any suggestions, male or female (for the others looking for name suggestions for themselves)

i liked Bella for a girl, i'm not sure though because i like really unusual names. rolleyes

I think its best to get a piggy first before naming or to go on what they look like. Here are mine:-

Boars

Sunshine - Colour of the sun

Twinkle - Pointy Aby/Peruvian starlike rosettes!

Cuzzy - Blonde daughter couldn't say custard but said cuzzy!

Eccles - Named after Christopher Eccleston (9th Doctor Who)

Pudsey - Blonde named after Pudsey Bear as we got him on CIN night

Radley - Named after the Handbags, Kelly on here named him!

Milo - Put to a poll on here!

Jasper - Was already named at rescue.

Sows

Flora - Floral named

Fleur - Flora's sister named after Fleur in Harry Potter and becaue she has some orange in her like a Flare.

Amber - Brown Gem Stone

Pearl - White Gem Stone

Elora - Little girl in Willow

Leia - Princess Leia Star Wars

Lyra - Little girl in the Golden Compass.

So if something takes your fancy, or she reminds you of something go for that.

I already have one pig called Flash. I don't have a theme though! :red

good names everyone! Both my middle names are in the flower list that stargrrlclaire wrote

So far i really like Lilly, Scarlet, Poppy, Lottie and Fleur!

I have a french obsession at the moment, with the language and place, so if anyone has any suggestions for that!
